name: mapillary_simpleUpload
title: Mapillary-2-Commons
description: Uploads an image from Mapillary (http://mapillary.com/) to Wikimedia Commons
author: Lokal_Profil

name: mapillary_WLM
title: Wiki Loves Monuments and Mapillary
description: A map of Wiki Loves Monuments objects from which you can also navigate Mapillary (http://mapillary.com/) and upload its images to Wikimedia Commons
keywords: tools, Mapillary, Commons, upload, WLM, map
author: peterneubauer, emijrp, Lokal_Profil

name: mapillary_widget
title: Commons Mapillary browser
description: A gadget which allows you to browse Mapillary (http://mapillary.com/) from a Wikimedia Commons image description page of an image uploaded from Mapillary.
author: peterneubauer, Lokal_Profil
